verses.text: \w David|strong="H1732"\w* therefore \w departed|strong="H3212"\w* thence, and \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w* to the \w cave|strong="H4631"\w* \w Adullam|strong="H5725"\w*: and when his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* and all his \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add it\add*, they went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* thither to him.

And every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \add that was\add* in \w distress|strong="H4689"\w*, and every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* that \add was\add* in \w debt|strong="H5378"\w*, and every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \add that was\add* \w discontented|strong="H4751"\w*, \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* themselves unto him; and he became a \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* over them: and there were with him about \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*.\f + \fr 22.2 \ft was in debt: Heb. had a creditor\f*\f + \fr 22.2 \ft discontented: Heb. bitter of soul\f*

¶ And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* thence to \w Mizpeh|strong="H4708"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*: and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, Let my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* and my \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, I pray thee, come \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, \add and be\add* with you, till I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* what \w God|strong="H0430"\w* will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* for me.

And he \w brought|strong="H5148"\w* them \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*: and they \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* with him all the \w while|strong="H3117"\w* that \w David|strong="H1732"\w* was in the \w hold|strong="H4686"\w*.

¶ And the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w Abide|strong="H3427"\w* not in the \w hold|strong="H4686"\w*; \w depart|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w get|strong="H0935"\w* thee into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*. Then \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w departed|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w forest|strong="H3293"\w* of \w Hareth|strong="H2802"\w*.

¶ When \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that \w David|strong="H1732"\w* was \w discovered|strong="H3045"\w*, and the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that \add were\add* with him, (now \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w* under a \w tree|strong="H0815"\w* in \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w*, having his \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and all his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \add were\add* \w standing|strong="H5324"\w* about him;)\f + \fr 22.6 \ft tree…: or, grove in a high place\f*

Then \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* that \w stood|strong="H5324"\w* about him, Hear \w now|strong="H8085"\w*, ye \w Benjamites|strong="H1145"\w*; will the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* every one of you \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* and \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*, \add and\add* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* you all \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w*, and \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w*;

That all of you have \w conspired|strong="H7194"\w* against me, and \add there is\add* none that \w sheweth|strong="H1540"\w* me that my \w son|strong="H1121"\w* hath made a \w league|strong="H3772"\w* with the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w*, and \add there is\add* none of you that is \w sorry|strong="H2470"\w* for me, or \w sheweth|strong="H1540"\w* unto me that my \w son|strong="H1121"\w* hath stirred \w up|strong="H6965"\w* my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* against me, to lie in \w wait|strong="H0693"\w*, as at this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*?\f + \fr 22.8 \ft sheweth…: Heb. uncovereth mine ear\f*

¶ Then \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w Doeg|strong="H1673"\w* the \w Edomite|strong="H0130"\w*, which was \w set|strong="H5324"\w* over the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* \w coming|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Nob|strong="H5011"\w*, to \w Ahimelech|strong="H0288"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahitub|strong="H0285"\w*.

And he \w enquired|strong="H7592"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* for him, and \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* him \w victuals|strong="H6720"\w*, and \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* him the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* of \w Goliath|strong="H1555"\w* the \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w*.

Then the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w Ahimelech|strong="H0288"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahitub|strong="H0285"\w*, and all his \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* that \add were\add* in \w Nob|strong="H5011"\w*: and they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* all of them to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* now, thou \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahitub|strong="H0285"\w*. And he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, Here I \add am\add*, my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*.\f + \fr 22.12 \ft Here…: Heb. Behold me\f*

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Why have ye \w conspired|strong="H7194"\w* against me, thou and the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w*, in that thou hast \w given|strong="H5414"\w* him \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, and a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and hast \w enquired|strong="H7592"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* for him, that he should \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* against me, to lie in \w wait|strong="H0693"\w*, as at this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*?

Then \w Ahimelech|strong="H0288"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, And who \add is so\add* \w faithful|strong="H0539"\w* among all thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* as \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, which is the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* son in \w law|strong="H2860"\w*, and \w goeth|strong="H5493"\w* at thy \w bidding|strong="H4928"\w*, and is \w honourable|strong="H3513"\w* in thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*?

Did I \w then|strong="H3117"\w* \w begin|strong="H2490"\w* to \w enquire|strong="H7592"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* for him? be it far from \w me|strong="H2486"\w*: let not the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w impute|strong="H7760"\w* \add any\add* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* unto his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \add nor\add* to all the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of my \w father|strong="H0001"\w*: for thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w nothing|strong="H1697"\w* of all this, \w less|strong="H6996"\w* or \w more|strong="H1419"\w*.\f + \fr 22.15 \ft less…: Heb. little or great\f*

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou shalt \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w Ahimelech|strong="H0288"\w*, thou, and all thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

¶ And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w footmen|strong="H7323"\w* that \w stood|strong="H5324"\w* about him, \w Turn|strong="H5437"\w*, and \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; because their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* also \add is\add* with \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and because they \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* when he \w fled|strong="H1272"\w*, and did not \w shew|strong="H1540"\w* it to me. But the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w would|strong="H0014"\w* not put \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* to \w fall|strong="H6293"\w* upon the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 22.17  t footmen: or, guard: Heb. runners *

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Doeg|strong="H1673"\w*, \w Turn|strong="H5437"\w* thou, and \w fall|strong="H6293"\w* upon the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*. And \w Doeg|strong="H1673"\w* the \w Edomite|strong="H0130"\w* \w turned|strong="H5437"\w*, and he \w fell|strong="H6293"\w* upon the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* on that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w fourscore|strong="H8084"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w persons|strong="H0376"\w* that did \w wear|strong="H5375"\w* a \w linen|strong="H0906"\w* \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*.

And \w Nob|strong="H5011"\w*, the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* he with the \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, both \w men|strong="H0376"\w* and \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, \w children|strong="H5768"\w* and \w sucklings|strong="H3243"\w*, and \w oxen|strong="H7794"\w*, and \w asses|strong="H2543"\w*, and \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w*, with the \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

¶ And \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahimelech|strong="H0288"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahitub|strong="H0285"\w*, \w named|strong="H8034"\w* \w Abiathar|strong="H0054"\w*, \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w*, and \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

And \w Abiathar|strong="H0054"\w* \w shewed|strong="H5046"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* that \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* had \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Abiathar|strong="H0054"\w*, I \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \add it\add* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, when \w Doeg|strong="H1673"\w* the \w Edomite|strong="H0130"\w* \add was\add* there, that he would \w surely|strong="H5046"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*: I have \w occasioned|strong="H5437"\w* \add the death\add* of all the \w persons|strong="H5315"\w* of thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w Abide|strong="H3427"\w* thou with me, \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* not: for he that \w seeketh|strong="H1245"\w* my \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w seeketh|strong="H1245"\w* thy \w life|strong="H5315"\w*: but with me thou \add shalt be\add* in \w safeguard|strong="H4931"\w*.
